title: doc: Go 1.7 release notes contains incorrect information about ppc64x instruction set usage
body:
The draft of the Go 1.7 release notes contains incorrect information concerning the instruction set requirements for ppc64 BE.

New in Go 1.7 is that power8 instructions are now used for ppc64le.  ppc64 big endian maintains compatibility with power5, as described in #16004.
